category: news
title: "Drivers responsible for delivering Samsung mobiles win union recognition"
excerpt: "DRIVERS who make deliveries for tech firm Samsung have won recognition for their trade union Unite. The 120 workers are employed by Yusen Logistics in Wellingborough in Northamptonshire. Unite launched a recruitment campaign in January and Unite now represents 90 per cent of the workforce."
